com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor

Class ReactorConnectOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.reactor.ReactorConnectOptions

  • public class ReactorConnectOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    ReactorConnectOptions to be used in the Reactor.connect(ReactorConnectOptions, ReactorRole, ReactorErrorInfo) call.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • connectionList

        public java.util.List<ReactorConnectInfo> connectionList()
        A list of connections. Add at least one connection to the list. Additional connections are used as backups for fail-over in case the first connection is lost. Each connection in the list will be tried with each reconnection attempt.
        Returns:
        the list of connections

      • reconnectAttemptLimit

        public int reconnectAttemptLimit()
        Returns the reconnectAttemptLimit value.
        Returns:
        the reconnectAttemptLimit value

      • reconnectAttemptLimit

        public int reconnectAttemptLimit(int limit)
        The maximum number of times the Reactor will attempt to reconnect a channel. If set to -1, there is no limit. Must be in the range of -1 - 2147483647. Default is 0.
        Parameters:
        limit - the maximum number of reconnect attempts
        Returns:
        ReactorReturnCodes.SUCCESS if the limit is valid, otherwise ReactorReturnCodes.PARAMETER_OUT_OF_RANGE if the limit is out of range

      • reconnectMinDelay

        public int reconnectMinDelay()
        Returns the reconnectMinDelay value.
        Returns:
        the reconnectMinDelay value

      • reconnectMinDelay

        public int reconnectMinDelay(int delay)
        The minimum time the Reactor will wait before attempting to reconnect, in milliseconds. Must be in the range of 1000 - 2147483647. Default is 1000. Default value is used if value is greater than or equal to zero and less than 1000.
        Parameters:
        delay - the minimum reconnect delay
        Returns:
        ReactorReturnCodes.SUCCESS if the delay is valid, otherwise ReactorReturnCodes.PARAMETER_OUT_OF_RANGE if the delay is less than zero

      • reconnectMaxDelay

        public int reconnectMaxDelay()
        Returns the reconnectMaxDelay value.
        Returns:
        the reconnectMaxDelay value

      • reconnectMaxDelay

        public int reconnectMaxDelay(int delay)
        The maximum time the Reactor will wait before attempting to reconnect, in milliseconds. Must be in the range of 1000 - 2147483647 and must be greater than or equal to reconnectMinDelay. Default is 1000. reconnectMinDelay value is used if value is less than reconnectMinDelay.
        Parameters:
        delay - the maximum reconnect delay
        Returns:
        ReactorReturnCodes.SUCCESS if the delay is valid, otherwise ReactorReturnCodes.PARAMETER_OUT_OF_RANGE if the delay is less than zero

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears this object for reuse.

      • copy

        public int copy(ReactorConnectOptions destOpts)
        This method will perform a deep copy into the passed in parameter's members from the Object calling this method.
        Parameters:
        destOpts - the value getting populated with the values of the calling Object
        Returns:
        ReactorReturnCodes.SUCCESS on success, ReactorReturnCodes.FAILURE if the destOpts is null.
